go_data.justification: E3 ubiquitin ligase is involved in protein degradation through ubiquitination.
E3 ubiquitin ligase, such as MuRF1, is upregulated during skeletal muscle atrophy and controls sarcomere muscle protein degradation.
E3 ubiquitin ligase, such as TRAF6, promotes the union of Lys63-bound polyubiquitin chains to its target proteins, leading to protein degradation.
E3 ubiquitin ligase, such as MuRF1, is selectively expressed in cardiac and skeletal muscles.
